sentences.en: Aberrant larvae may lodge in the liver, producing granulomatous lesions and hepatomegaly.
sentences.cn: 蛔蚴可误入肝门, 引起肉芽肿性损害及肝肿大.

sentences.en: All the larvae are straight, with a slight taper towards the rear.
sentences.cn: 所有幼虫都是直形背部略带锥形.

sentences.en: Because one way ladybugs compete is by consuming the eggs and larvae of rival species.
sentences.cn: 因为瓢虫的一种竞争手段是吃对手的卵或者幼虫。

sentences.en: FLATOW: ...thank you, in their beaks, and poke in to pull out these larvae out of a tree.
sentences.cn: 傅拉托：对，...谢谢你，是用它们的"喙"(鸟嘴)，把树枝戳进洞里去，把幼虫从树洞里钓出来。

sentences.en: I had some ginger powder in the house, so I tried it with the larvae.
sentences.cn: 我家里有些生姜粉，所以我就拿来试探这些幼虫。

sentences.en: In fact, the animal uses its middle finger to find and harvest insect larvae in trees.
sentences.cn: 实际上， 这种动物用其中指搜索和俘获藏在树木里的昆虫幼虫。

sentences.en: Larvae are parasitic on sheep.
sentences.cn: 幼虫寄生在绵羊的身上。

sentences.en: Pseudopodia are characteristic of many dipterous larvae.
sentences.cn: 伪足为多数双翅目幼虫所特有.

sentences.en: Some larvae extend the galleries to form niches.
sentences.cn: 许多幼虫将坑道延伸扩大成壁龛.

sentences.en: The earthbound larvae from which they develop are less pretty, but just as predatory.
sentences.cn: 幼虫生活在地面上，不像成虫后那么美丽，但是同样会捕食。

sentences.en: The eggs quickly hatch into larvae.
sentences.cn: 虫卵很快孵化成幼虫。

sentences.en: The larvae burrow into cracks in the floor.
sentences.cn: 幼虫钻进了地板的缝隙里。

sentences.en: The larvae may be excreted in the faeces.
sentences.cn: 幼虫会连同粪便排出.

sentences.en: The larvae of flies parasitize earthworms.
sentences.cn: 蝇的幼虫寄生在蚯蚓上.

sentences.en: The larvae prey upon small aphids.
sentences.cn: 这种幼虫以小蚜虫为食。

sentences.en: The pulmonary migration of larvae is associated with fever, cough, occasionally hemoptysis.
sentences.cn: 蛔蚴肺部移行,可伴有发热 、 咳嗽 、 偶尔咯血.

sentences.en: The sputum contains larvae and eosinophils.
sentences.cn: 痰中含有蛔蚴及嗜酸性细胞.

sentences.en: They deposit larvae that will grow up to egglaying females.
sentences.cn: 它们产生幼蚜,以后发育为产卵雌蚜.

sentences.en: We know that freshwater eels reproduce in the ocean because larvae have been found drifting near the surface thousands of miles from any shore.
sentences.cn: 我们知道淡水鳗鱼在海里繁殖，因为我们曾经在距所有海岸数千英里的海面发现过漂动的鳗鱼幼体。

sentences.en: When the eggs hatch the larvae eat the living flesh of the host animal.
sentences.cn: 当卵孵化后，幼虫取食寄主的鲜肉。

trans.tran_cn: （昆虫的）幼虫，幼体( larva的名词复数 )，(larva的复数)
